sentences.sentence: The guy says, "Did these little piggies say wee wee wee all the way home?"
sentences.translation: 那个人说：“这些小猪回家一路上都说噜噜噜吗？”

sentences.sentence: Merry Christmas to all of my piggies ! ! ! !
sentences.translation: 祝我的所有猪仔猪女圣诞快乐！

sentences.sentence: See the complete heel, arch and five little piggies?
sentences.translation: 看见这完整的脚后跟脚弓和五个脚趾了吗？
